Bless now as we have an opportunity for responding, a time of invitation. Lord, I pray that you'd have your will and way, work in hearts and lives. I pray that you'd be glorified through every decision. For it's in Christ's name we pray. Would you stand with me, heads are bowed, eyes are closed.
